message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this valuable product. I think it would be incredibly beneficial for you.  Given its value, I'm offering it at $11,500. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. Could we perhaps negotiate the price down to $10,000?
Hi Bob, I understand your desire to stay within budget, but $10,000 is below the true value of this product.  I could meet you halfway â€“ how about $10,750?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $10,500.
